Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: アムジル
Entry.EnglishText: Amzil

Entry.JapaneseText: ナイラ
Entry.EnglishText: Nayla

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の子
Entry.EnglishText: Boy

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: ……これが俺たちの娘か。 目や鼻筋がきみにそっくりだ。 この子はきっとキレイな子になるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: So this is our daughter... She has your eyes and nose. She's going to be beautiful, I just know it.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ……でも、見て…… 口元はあなたにそっくり……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, but look! She has your lips...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……素敵だ…… この子は俺たちの希望だよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... She's lovely. This child is our hope.

Entry.JapaneseText: 名前なんだけど…… <Hilda>……なんてどう？
Entry.EnglishText: She needs a name... What do you think of "<Hilda>?"

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>…… うん、いい響きだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... It has a nice ring to it.

Entry.JapaneseText: ずっと前から考えてたの。 この子は気に入ってくれるかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: I've been pondering this for a while now. Do you think she'll like it?

Entry.JapaneseText: もちろんさ。 なあ、<Hilda>！
Entry.EnglishText: Of course she will. Right, my little <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何があっても守ろう…… 俺たちの<Hilda>を…… このすばらしい生命を……
Entry.EnglishText: No matter what happens, I'll do whatever it takes to protect this beautiful soul... To keep our little <Hilda> safe...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>……<Hilda>…… しっかりして、<Hilda>……！
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>... Hang in there, <Hilda>!

Entry.JapaneseText: あなた、どうしましょう……！ <Hilda>の熱が下がらないの！
Entry.EnglishText: Darling, what should we do?! <Hilda>'s fever won't go down!

Entry.JapaneseText: やはり、ガジュマとヒューマの間に 生まれた子は身体が……
Entry.EnglishText: I guess it's true that children born between Gajuma and Huma have a weaker constitution...

Entry.JapaneseText: 医者もダメ、薬も効かない…… どうすればいいんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: The doctors are no help, and the medicine isn't working... What do we do?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 昔……西の島に、不思議な力に 満ちた遺跡があるって聞いたわ。 その力があれば、もしかしたら……
Entry.EnglishText: Well... A long time ago, I heard that there were ruins on a western island that are brimming with a mysterious power. Maybe that power would be able to...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう他にあては何もない。 ……行こう、ナイラ。 <Hilda>を死なせてなるものか……！
Entry.EnglishText: We have no other choice. Let's go, Nayla. There's no way we're going to let <Hilda> die!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはボクが見てるから、 他の患者さんを診てあげて！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm taking care of the patients here, so go tend to the other ones!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはいいから、 早く<Eugene>のところへ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm fine here. Hurry over to <Eugene>!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>？ ココにはいないヨ!?
Entry.EnglishText: You need <Hilda>? She's not here!

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんが、ガジュマと 話をしちゃいけないって…… おじさん、ごめんなさい……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry mister... My dad made me promise I wouldn't talk to any Gajuma.

Entry.JapaneseText: お父さんが外で遊んじゃ ダメだって言うんだ。 つまんないよー！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm so boooored! My dad won't let me play outside.

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえねえ、ボクの雪だるま、 壊されてなかった？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey hey, are my snowmen still okay?

Entry.JapaneseText: お家の中でも、雪だるまが 作れたらいいのになぁー！
Entry.EnglishText: Wish I could build snowmen inside, too. That'd be the coolest!

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえねえ、お姉さん、 どうして泣きそうな顔してるの？ 悲しいの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey lady, why do you look like you're gonna cry? Are you sad?

Entry.JapaneseText: ねえねえ、さっきバイラスの 声が聞こえたけど……見た？
Entry.EnglishText: I thought I heard Biruses earlier... Did you see them?

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉さん……ボクさ…… お姉さんにボクの雪だるま…… プレゼントするよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hey miss... I...made you a snowman...as a present...

Entry.JapaneseText: だからさ……えっとさ…… 大きくなったらさ、ボクとさ…… けっこん……してくれる？
Entry.EnglishText: So...um...when I grow up... Will you marry me?

Entry.JapaneseText: お姉さんって、キレイだね。 ウチのお母さんみたい。
Entry.EnglishText: You're very pretty. You remind me of my mom.

Entry.JapaneseText: お兄さんたち、カッコイイね！ ボクもお兄さんたちみたいに なりたいなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: You guys are so cool! I wanna be like you...

Entry.JapaneseText: 寒い？ でも今日は暖かいくらいだよ？
Entry.EnglishText: You're cold? But it's so warm out today.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何の用だ…… 悪いが話す事なんてないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Gajuma? I'm sorry, but I have no desire to talk to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: それにしてもラッキーだったよ。 街がこのありさまだろ……？
Entry.EnglishText: I feel like I lucked out considering everything that happened...

Entry.JapaneseText: もう少し帰るのが遅かったら、 ガジュマどもに家を荒らされてた だろうからな……
Entry.EnglishText: Had I not come home when I did, my house could've gotten wrecked by Gajuma...

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらく旅に出てたんだが、 誰かが使ったような跡が あるんだよなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I've found evidence that someone was here when I was out of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: 床下に隠しておいた、とっておきの 銘酒ワンハンドレッドロンリーが 心なしか減ってるような気が……
Entry.EnglishText: The bottle of One Hundred Lonely I keep stashed under the floorboards seems to be running empty...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何の用だ…… 悪いが話す事なんてないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Gajuma? I'm sorry, but I have no desire to talk to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらく旅に出てたんだが、 誰かが使ったような跡が あるんだよなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I've found evidence that someone was here when I was out of town...

Entry.JapaneseText: 床下に隠しておいた、とっておきの 銘酒ワンハンドレッドロンリーが 心なしか減ってるような気が……
Entry.EnglishText: The bottle of One Hundred Lonely I keep stashed under the floorboards seems to be running empty...

Entry.JapaneseText: 減ってたのは酒だけじゃなかった！ ブルーベリージャムが半分以上 食べられてたんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: And alcohol isn't the only thing that's turning up missing! Someone ate half of my blueberry jam!

Entry.JapaneseText: パンクズは落ちてなかったから、 ジャムだけ食べやがったんだ。 変わった侵入者だ……！
Entry.EnglishText: And since they didn't leave any breadcrumbs to go with it, they had to have eaten it straight from the jar! What kind of sicko would do that?!
Entry.Notes: Japanese has been liberated a little here

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスの群れが街を襲ったけど、 まさか、ウチに入って盗み食いした のは、バイラスじゃないよな？
Entry.EnglishText: I know this city got attacked by Biruses, but surely a Birus wouldn't break into my house to steal food...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが何の用だ…… 悪いが話す事なんてないぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: What do you want from me, Gajuma? I'm sorry, but I have no desire to talk to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 盗み食い野郎はいるし、 バイラスは出るし…… ガジュマどもはおっかないし……
Entry.EnglishText: Someone stole my food, and we're getting attacked by Biruses... Not to mention the Gajuma are starting to scare me...

Entry.JapaneseText: もっと家のカギを丈夫にして、 護身用の武器も用意しなくちゃ いけないな……
Entry.EnglishText: I need to lock the house up better and get some kind of weapon for safety.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あんた……確かに俺は ガジュマの事を良く思ってないが、 あんたに恨みを買うような事は してないはずだぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: I might not think much of Gajuma, but I wasn't trying to piss you off or anything...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヘ、変なマネはしないでくれ……
Entry.EnglishText: J-Just don't do anything crazy...

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく、ベルサスの奴ら、 とんでもない事をしてくれたぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's wrong with those people from Belsas?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 事件の噂が流れて来てから、 今まで以上にガジュマどもが 荒っぽくなってるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since rumors of what happened made their way here, the Gajuma have become even more rude...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマさんよ、あんたはいいな。 国の偉いさんがガジュマを守るって 言ったんだからな……
Entry.EnglishText: Aren't you Gajuma lucky? You've got a government official saying she's going to protect you all.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、おれみたいな ヒューマは大変だ…… どうしてヒューマがこんな 思いをしなきゃならないんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: But now Huma like me have it rough... Why do we have to feel this way?!

Entry.JapaneseText: これ以上、この街には 住めないかもしれないな…… どこに行けば、ヒューマが 安全に暮らせると思う？
Entry.EnglishText: I don't feel safe living here anymore... Do you know anywhere that's safe for Huma to live?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何なんだよ、この音…… 大津波でも来るんじゃ ないだろうな……？
Entry.EnglishText: What's that sound...? Are we going to get hit by a tsunami...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……この前までは、理由もなく ガジュマが憎かったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I used to hate Gajuma without reason...

Entry.JapaneseText: で、でも今は……お互い、色々と イヤな部分が見えちまってさ…… それを知らん顔は……なぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: B-But, now I see that both sides have treated each other unfairly... I can't ignore that...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺も<Blue>漆黒の翼<White>の一員だ！ ヒューマもガジュマも関係ない！ みんなで協力してがんばるぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm a member of the <Blue>Dark Wings<White> now! Race doesn't matter, we'll all work together to make things better!
Entry.Notes: again, dunno what name you're using

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ガジュマと同じ街で 暮らすって……難しいな……
Entry.EnglishText: Living in the same town as Gajuma is rough...

Entry.JapaneseText: お注射しますね。 少しチクッとしますけど、 ガマンしてくださいね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm going to give you an injection. It's going to sting a little, but please try not to let it bother you.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、これで終わりです。
Entry.EnglishText: There, all done.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、ありがとう…… 注射、痛くなかったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Th-Thanks. The shot didn't really hurt...

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとう…… 楽になったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you... I feel much better now...

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん、うーん……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmm, hmm...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>を探してる？ <Cyan>幻の庭<White>、ねえ……
Entry.EnglishText: You're searching for the <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>? Hm...

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱ、知らないよネ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm guessing you don't know anything either...

Entry.JapaneseText: うーん、もしかして、 ネレグの塔の事かなぁ？
Entry.EnglishText: Well, I wonder if by any chance it has something to do with the Tower of Nereg?

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔？
Entry.EnglishText: The Tower of Nereg?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、ネジャナ半島にある 古代の人々が作ったっていう塔さ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, it's said to have been built in ancient times by the people living on the Nejana Peninsula.

Entry.JapaneseText: ネジャナ半島というと…… このノルゼンの北東にある あれか？
Entry.EnglishText: The Nejana Peninsula... That's to the northeast of Nolzen, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: そこのてっぺんに 空中庭園があるって 聞いた事があるんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: There's supposed to be a sky garden at the very top of the tower, or so I've heard.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……まさに、そのままだな。 <Cyan>「雲海にそびえし古の塔」<White>……
Entry.EnglishText: That certainly sounds like the "<Cyan>tower which soars above a sea of clouds<White>" that we're looking for...

Entry.JapaneseText: ついに見つけたぜ！ <Cyan>「ネレグの塔」<White>か！
Entry.EnglishText: We finally found it! Onward, to the <Cyan>Tower of Nereg<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴重なお話、ありがとう！
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for telling us about it! You really helped us out!

Entry.JapaneseText: いやいや、気をつけてね。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't mention it. You take care now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔は、 ネジャナ半島にある塔さ。 古代の人々が作ったらしいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The Tower of Nereg lies on Nejana Peninsula. They say it was built by an ancient civilization.

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔に入って、 帰って来た者はないって いうウワサもあるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: They also say that none who have entered the tower made it back out.

Entry.JapaneseText: 充分、気をつけなよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'd be careful if I were you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔からは、時々、 恐ろしい声が聞こえるとか 聞こえないとか……
Entry.EnglishText: Sometimes, I wonder if I've heard a frightening voice coming from the Tower of Nereg...

Entry.JapaneseText: ネレグの塔は、聖なる何かを たたえて作られたとかいう 話を聞いた事があるなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: I once heard that the Tower of Nereg was built to honor something sacred...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
